title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: We're looking for an experienced Frontend Developer to build performant React applications with modern UI frameworks. You'll work with a talented team to create beautiful, responsive web experiences using React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS. Experience with state management libraries like Redux or Zustand is a plus.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Join our backend team to design and implement scalable RESTful APIs using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. You'll be responsible for database design, API development, and ensuring high performance. Experience with Prisma ORM and microservices architecture is highly valued.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Build end-to-end MERN stack applications deployed on cloud platforms like Vercel and AWS. You'll work on both frontend and backend, implementing features from database to UI. Strong knowledge of React, Node.js, and MongoDB is required. DevOps experience is a bonus.

title: React Engineer
description: Create reusable React components with a focus on accessibility and performance. We're building a design system used by thousands of developers. You'll work on component libraries, documentation, and ensuring WCAG compliance. Experience with Storybook and testing frameworks is essential.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Manage CI/CD pipelines, containerization with Docker/Kubernetes, and cloud infrastructure on AWS. You'll automate deployment processes, monitor system performance, and ensure high availability. Experience with Terraform, Jenkins, and monitoring tools is required.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design beautiful, intuitive user interfaces for web and mobile applications. Conduct user research, create wireframes and prototypes using Figma, and collaborate with developers to bring designs to life. Strong portfolio showcasing modern design principles required.

title: Python Developer
description: Develop data processing pipelines and machine learning models using Python, Django, and popular ML frameworks. Work with large datasets, implement ETL processes, and build APIs for data services. Experience with Pandas, NumPy, and scikit-learn is essential.

title: Mobile Developer (React Native)
description: Build cross-platform mobile applications using React Native. You'll develop features for both iOS and Android, integrate with native modules, and ensure smooth performance. Experience with mobile-specific challenges like offline storage and push notifications is valued.

title: QA Automation Engineer
description: Design and implement automated testing frameworks for web applications. Write test cases, perform regression testing, and work with CI/CD pipelines. Proficiency in Selenium, Jest, Cypress, or Playwright is required. Experience with API testing is a plus.

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product strategy and roadmap for our SaaS platform. Work with engineering, design, and stakeholders to define requirements, prioritize features, and ensure successful product launches. Strong analytical skills and experience with agile methodologies required.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze business data to provide actionable insights. Create dashboards and reports using SQL, Python, and visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI. Work with stakeholders to understand data needs and deliver data-driven recommendations.

title: Cybersecurity Specialist
description: Protect organizational infrastructure from cyber threats. Conduct security audits, implement security protocols, monitor for vulnerabilities, and respond to security incidents. Experience with penetration testing and security frameworks (NIST, ISO) required.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Develop and deploy machine learning models at scale. Work with TensorFlow, PyTorch, and cloud ML platforms. Design experiments, train models, and optimize for production. PhD or Masters in CS/ML preferred with strong Python skills.

title: WordPress Developer
description: Build custom WordPress themes and plugins for client websites. Optimize site performance, ensure security best practices, and integrate third-party APIs. Strong PHP, JavaScript, and CSS skills required. Experience with WooCommerce is a plus.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Join our engineering team as a summer intern. Work on real projects using modern web technologies. Learn from experienced developers while contributing to our product. This is a paid internship with potential for full-time conversion. Students and recent graduates welcome.

title: Solutions Architect
description: Design scalable cloud-based solutions for enterprise clients. Work with AWS, Azure, and GCP to architect systems that meet business requirements. Lead technical discussions, create architecture diagrams, and guide development teams. 5+ years experience required.

title: Technical Writer
description: Create clear, comprehensive technical documentation for software products. Write API documentation, user guides, tutorials, and release notes. Work closely with engineers to understand features and translate technical concepts for various audiences.

title: Blockchain Developer
description: Develop smart contracts and decentralized applications (DApps) on Ethereum and other blockchain platforms. Work with Solidity, Web3.js, and integrate blockchain functionality into web applications. Understanding of DeFi protocols and NFTs is a plus.

title: Game Developer (Unity)
description: Create immersive gaming experiences using Unity and C#. Develop gameplay mechanics, implement physics and animations, optimize performance for multiple platforms. Experience with 3D graphics, shaders, and multiplayer networking is highly valued.

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description: Ensure reliability and performance of production systems. Monitor system health, implement observability tools, conduct incident response, and improve system resilience. Experience with Kubernetes, Prometheus, Grafana, and on-call rotations required.
